transcript: if you increase the quality of your customers you increase the quality of your business when you charge more money for your products or Services you get an increased emotional investment because on the flip side if you decrease your price people care less about your products and services they won't even try enough that even if your product or service is good they never even gave it a shot and so when you raise the price you raise their emotional investment and in a real way you actually increase the likelihood that they get results
